articles.title: Top U.S. archbishops denounce American foreign policy - NPR
articles.description: The three most-senior cardinals leading U.S. archdioceses issued the rebuke in a joint statement on Monday, saying recent policies have thrown America's "morale role in confronting evil" into question.
articles.content: The three highest-ranking heads of Roman Catholic archdioceses in the United States issued a strongly worded statement on Monday criticizing the Trump administration's foreign policy without mentioni… [+2077 chars]
